name: Tesla Model 3
description: The Tesla Model 3 is a compact executive sedan that is battery powered and produced by Tesla. Limited production started in mid-2017, with full production in September 2017.

name: Nissan Leaf
description: The Nissan Leaf is a compact five-door hatchback electric car. It was the world's best-selling highway-capable electric car in history.

name: Chevrolet Bolt EV
description: The Chevrolet Bolt EV is a front-motor, front-wheel-drive all-electric subcompact hatchback marketed by Chevrolet.

name: BMW i3
description: The BMW i3 is a B-class, high-roof hatchback manufactured and marketed by BMW with an electric powertrain using rear wheel drive.

name: Hyundai Kona Electric
description: The Hyundai Kona Electric is a subcompact crossover SUV. It offers impressive range and practicality in a compact package.
